scope.title: Clinical coding automation with the Royal Free and Kettering General
scope.summary: Data scientists in the AI Lab Skunkworks team and the NHS Transformation Directorate Analytics unit are supporting this project to investigate whether the process of clinical coding (applying standard code words to health records) can be supported by artificial intelligence.
